subject: Baseball
Blood Clots
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: The 26-year-old right-hander Dillon Gee had the clot removed after being examined Monday and was placed on the disabled list. The clot is unlikely to be career threatening.
snippet: The 26-year-old right-hander Dillon Gee had the clot removed after being examined Monday and was placed on the disabled list. The clot is unlikely to be career threatening.
